with TemporaryDirectory() as e, TemporaryDirectory() as d:
    dname = join(d, 'dir')
    makedirs(dname)
    sm = join(e, 'nom')
    makedirs(sm)


    class A(DataSourceDirLoader):

        def load(self, ident):
            return sm
    cut = A(dname)
    with self.assertRaisesRegexp(LoadFailed, 'outside of the base'):
        cut('ident')
